title: Large Cell Phone Purchase Rumor
subtitle: Social media rumors claim several suspicious purchases of 60 cell phones were made by Middle Eastern men at Walmarts in or around Lebanon, Missouri.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Middle Eastern men purchased dozens of burner cell phones at Walmarts in and around Lebanon, Missouri (ostensibly to carry out terror attacks); at the same time, multiple stores reported propane tank thefts.
